publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3905 Malcolm Chisholm: Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Workâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Citadel Youth Centre in Leith on winning a substantial award from the Big Lottery Fund to promote intergenerational work; acknowledges the superb work that the centre has been doing with young people for very many years; welcomes this important new initiative, which will bring together younger and older people to reduce intergenerational conflict and promote community cohesion through a skills sharing and hobby programme, and supports the development of other similar programmes across Scotland to the mutual advantage of older and younger people.

S3M-3905 Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Work (lodged on 14 April 2009) Rhona Brankin*, Hugh Henry*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Elaine Murray*, Patricia Ferguson*, Sarah Boyack*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Claire Baker*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Gil Paterson*, Des McNulty*, Sandra White*
S3M-3905 Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Work (lodged on 14 April 2009) Robin Harper*, Aileen Campbell*, Trish Godman*, Ian McKee*
S3M-3905 Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Work (lodged on 14 April 2009) Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3905 Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Work (lodged on 14 April 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3905 Citadel Youth Centre and Intergenerational Work (lodged on 14 April 2009) Pauline McNeill*
